Alex Johnson serves as the Board Chair of the Computational Life Sciences Foundation. With a background in both computational biology and business leadership, Alex brings a unique perspective to the foundation's governance.

Alex is committed to expanding the foundation's impact through strategic partnerships and innovative funding models.
